LanguageData.KillerRabbitSingleArrived:
A rabbit of Caerbannog has arrived!
Beware, this predator will retaliate immediately when attacked and hunt for food very often!
LanguageData.KillerRabbitPackArrived:
A pack of rabbits of Caerbannog have arrived!
Beware, these predators will retaliate immediately when attacked and hunt for food very often!
